concept.title: Installing Sametime on your device
concept.shortdesc: Before you can use HCL Sametime on your iOS device you must install the HCL Sametime app.

conbody.p: By using the HCL Sametime app, you can synchronize communication among devices.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p:
The HCL SametimeÂ® for iOS app supports the following devices:
Apple devices that run iOS 14.0 or later
iPad tablets that run iPadOS 14.0 or later

section.title: Installing the app
section.p: To install the app, locate the HCL Sametime app in the Apple App Store store and select Install. After you install the app, select Open to start it. The first time that you open the app, you must configure a community.
